meanings.definition: A flat round cake of bread
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious farl with my soup for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The baker made fresh farls every morning for the customers.
meanings.sent3: The farl looked like a miniature sun, golden and round.
meanings.sent4: She served the farl on a plate, a symbol of warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the farl baking in the oven filled the kitchen with happiness.

meanings.definition: To divide into quarters or pieces
meanings.sent1: Please farl the pizza so everyone can have a slice.
meanings.sent2: He carefully farled the paper into tiny squares for the art project.
meanings.sent3: The magician seemed to farl the scarf into multiple pieces, amazing the audience.
meanings.sent4: The decision to farl the team into smaller groups led to better collaboration.
meanings.sent5: She had to farl the cake into equal parts to share with her friends.
